name: Chupa Chups Tubes Assorted Flavours 15 pcs
description:
A playful treat featuring 15 pieces of chewy, fruit-flavored candy tubes in a variety of flavors. Each 90 gm pack delivers a fun and delicious experience for candy lovers of all ages. Perfect for sharing or enjoying solo, these assorted flavors are a great way to indulge in a sweet, tangy delight.
